sn56.129-130:0.3: Dying as Ghosts and Reborn as Gods
sn56.129-130:1.1: “… the sentient beings who die as ghosts and are reborn as gods are few, while those who die as ghosts and are reborn in hell are many.”
sn56.129-130:1.2: “… the sentient beings who die as ghosts and are reborn as gods are few, while those who die as ghosts and are reborn in the animal realm are many.”
